scripts.build-android-staging: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-android-staging && npm run remind -s && expo build:android --release-channel staging) || true
scripts.build-android-beta: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-android-beta && npm run remind -s && expo build:android --release-channel beta) || true
scripts.build-android-production: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-android-production && npm run remind -s && expo build:android --release-channel production) || true
scripts.build-ios-staging: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-ios-staging && npm run remind -s && expo build:ios --release-channel staging) || true
scripts.build-ios-beta: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-ios-beta && npm run remind -s && expo build:ios --release-channel beta) || true
scripts.build-ios-production: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-ios-production && npm run remind -s && expo build:ios --release-channel production) || true
scripts.push-apps-to-staging: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-apps-to-staging && npm run confirm -s && npm run pre-push-swap && expo publish --release-channel staging && npm run post-push-restore) || true
scripts.push-apps-to-beta: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-apps-to-beta && npm run confirm -s && npm run pre-push-swap && expo publish --release-channel beta && npm run post-push-restore) || true
scripts.push-apps-to-production: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-apps-to-production && npm run confirm -s && npm run pre-push-swap && expo publish --release-channel production && npm run post-push-restore) || true
scripts.push-web-to-staging: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-web-to-staging && npm run confirm -s && npm run pre-push-swap && expo build:web && cp -r web-build-overrides/* web-build && node ./scripts/pushWebToStaging.js && npm run post-push-restore) || true
scripts.push-web-staging-to-production: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-web-staging-to-production && npm run confirm -s && node ./scripts/pushWebStagingToProduction.js) || true
scripts.remind:
read -p 'Did you update the version number and rerun change-tenant? (y/N) ' -n 1 -r && echo '
' && [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]
